title.en: Biographies of Sun Tzu and Wu Qi
title.raw: 《孫子吳起列傳》 Biographies of Sun Tzu and Wu Qi

sentences.zh: 孫子武者，齊人也。

translations.text: Sun Tzu Wu was a Qi man.

sentences.zh: 以兵法見於吳王闔廬。

translations.text: With military methods appeared before Wu King Helu.

sentences.zh: 闔廬曰：「子之十三篇，吾盡觀之矣，可以小試勒兵乎？」

translations.text: Helu said: 'Your thirteen chapters, I have completely viewed them, can make a small test restraining troops?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「可。」

translations.text: Answered: 'Acceptable.'

sentences.zh: 闔廬曰：「可試以婦人乎？」

translations.text: Helu said: 'Can test with women?'
Said: 'Acceptable.'

sentences.zh: 於是許之，出宮中美女，得百八十人。

translations.text: Thus permitted it, took palace beauties, obtained one hundred eighty persons.

sentences.zh: 孫子分為二隊，以王之寵姬二人各為隊長，皆令持戟。

translations.text: Sun Tzu divided into two teams, with the king's favored consorts two as team leaders each, all commanded to hold halberds.

sentences.zh: 令之曰：「汝知而心與左右手背乎？」

translations.text: Commanded them saying: 'You know your heart and left right hand back?'

translations.text: Women said: 'Know it.'

sentences.zh: 孫子曰：「前，則視心；

translations.text: Sun Tzu said: 'Forward, then look at heart;

sentences.zh: 左，視左手；

translations.text: left, look at left hand;

sentences.zh: 右，視右手；

translations.text: right, look at right hand;

sentences.zh: 後，即視背。」

translations.text: back, then look at back.'

sentences.zh: 婦人曰：「諾。」

translations.text: Women said: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 約束既布，乃設鈇鉞，即三令五申之。

translations.text: Regulations having been issued, then set up axe and battle-axe, immediately three commands five declarations.

sentences.zh: 於是鼓之右，婦人大笑。

translations.text: Thus drummed right, women greatly laughed.

sentences.zh: 孫子曰：「約束不明，申令不熟，將之罪也。」

translations.text: Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime.'

sentences.zh: 復三令五申而鼓之左，婦人復大笑。

translations.text: Again three commands five declarations and drummed left, women again greatly laughed.

sentences.zh: 孫子曰：「約束不明，申令不熟，將之罪也；

translations.text: Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime;

sentences.zh: 既已明而不如法者，吏士之罪也。」

translations.text: having already been clear yet not following method, officers and soldiers' crime.'

sentences.zh: 乃欲斬左右隊長。

translations.text: Thus wished to behead left right team leaders.

sentences.zh: 吳王從臺上觀，見且斬愛姬，大駭。

translations.text: Wu king from platform observed, saw about to behead beloved consorts, greatly alarmed.

sentences.zh: 趣使使下令曰：「寡人已知將軍能用兵矣。

translations.text: Hastily sent envoy to issue command saying: 'I already know general can use troops.

sentences.zh: 寡人非此二姬，食不甘味，願勿斬也。」

translations.text: I without these two consorts, food not sweet, wish not to behead.'

sentences.zh: 孫子曰：「臣既已受命為將，將在軍，君命有所不受。」

translations.text: Sun Tzu said: 'Subject having already received command as general, general in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.'

sentences.zh: 遂斬隊長二人以徇。

translations.text: Thus beheaded two team leaders to show.

sentences.zh: 用其次為隊長，於是復鼓之。

translations.text: Used their seconds as team leaders, thus again drummed.

sentences.zh: 婦人左右前後跪起皆中規矩繩墨，無敢出聲。

translations.text: Women left right forward back kneel rise all hit compass square ink-line, none dared make sound.

sentences.zh: 於是孫子使使報王曰：「兵既整齊，王可試下觀之，唯王所欲用之，雖赴水火猶可也。」

translations.text: Thus Sun Tzu sent envoy to report king saying: 'Troops already orderly, king can try descend to observe, as king wishes to use them, though go to water fire still acceptable.'

sentences.zh: 吳王曰：「將軍罷休就舍，寡人不願下觀。」

translations.text: Wu king said: 'General rest return to quarters, I do not wish to descend observe.'

sentences.zh: 孫子曰：「王徒好其言，不能用其實。」

translations.text: Sun Tzu said: 'King merely likes its words, cannot use its reality.'

sentences.zh: 於是闔廬知孫子能用兵，卒以為將。

translations.text: Thus Helu knew Sun Tzu could use troops, ultimately made him general.

sentences.zh: 西破彊楚，入郢，北威齊晉，顯名諸侯，孫子與有力焉。

translations.text: West broke strong Chu, entered Ying, north awed Qi Jin, displayed name among feudal lords, Sun Tzu had strength therein.

Sun Tzu Wu was a Qi man. With military methods appeared before Wu King Helu. Helu said: 'Your thirteen chapters, I have completely viewed them, can make a small test restraining troops?' Answered: 'Acceptable.' Helu said: 'Can test with women?' Said: 'Acceptable.' Thus permitted it, took palace beauties, obtained one hundred eighty persons. Sun Tzu divided into two teams, with the king's favored consorts two as team leaders each, all commanded to hold halberds. Commanded them saying: 'You know your heart and left right hand back?' Women said: 'Know it.' Sun Tzu said: 'Forward, then look at heart; left, look at left hand; right, look at right hand; back, then look at back.' Women said: 'Yes.' Regulations having been issued, then set up axe and battle-axe, immediately three commands five declarations. Thus drummed right, women greatly laughed. Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime.' Again three commands five declarations and drummed left, women again greatly laughed. Sun Tzu said: 'Regulations unclear, declared commands not familiar, general's crime; having already been clear yet not following method, officers and soldiers' crime.' Thus wished to behead left right team leaders. Wu king from platform observed, saw about to behead beloved consorts, greatly alarmed. Hastily sent envoy to issue command saying: 'I already know general can use troops. I without these two consorts, food not sweet, wish not to behead.' Sun Tzu said: 'Subject having already received command as general, general in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.' Thus beheaded two team leaders to show. Used their seconds as team leaders, thus again drummed. Women left right forward back kneel rise all hit compass square ink-line, none dared make sound. Thus Sun Tzu sent envoy to report king saying: 'Troops already orderly, king can try descend to observe, as king wishes to use them, though go to water fire still acceptable.' Wu king said: 'General rest return to quarters, I do not wish to descend observe.' Sun Tzu said: 'King merely likes its words, cannot use its reality.' Thus Helu knew Sun Tzu could use troops, ultimately made him general. West broke strong Chu, entered Ying, north awed Qi Jin, displayed name among feudal lords, Sun Tzu had strength therein.

sentences.zh: 孫武既死，後百餘歲有孫臏。

translations.text: Sun Wu having died, after over hundred years had Sun Bin.

sentences.zh: 臏生阿鄄之閒，臏亦孫武之後世子孫也。

translations.text: Bin born between A and Juan, Bin also Sun Wu's later generation descendants.

sentences.zh: 孫臏嘗與龐涓俱學兵法。

translations.text: Sun Bin once together with Pang Juan studied military methods.

sentences.zh: 龐涓既事魏，得為惠王將軍，而自以為能不及孫臏，乃陰使召孫臏。

translations.text: Pang Juan having served Wei, obtained as Hui Wang general, yet considered his ability not equal to Sun Bin, thus secretly sent to summon Sun Bin.

sentences.zh: 臏至，龐涓恐其賢於己，疾之，則以法刑斷其兩足而黥之，欲隱勿見。

translations.text: Bin arrived, Pang Juan feared his worthiness exceeded himself, resented him, then with legal punishment severed his two feet and tattooed him, wished to hide not see.

Sun Wu having died, after over hundred years had Sun Bin. Bin born between A and Juan, Bin also Sun Wu's later generation descendants. Sun Bin once together with Pang Juan studied military methods. Pang Juan having served Wei, obtained as Hui Wang general, yet considered his ability not equal to Sun Bin, thus secretly sent to summon Sun Bin. Bin arrived, Pang Juan feared his worthiness exceeded himself, resented him, then with legal punishment severed his two feet and tattooed him, wished to hide not see.

sentences.zh: 齊使者如梁，孫臏以刑徒陰見，說齊使。

translations.text: Qi envoy to Liang, Sun Bin as punished prisoner secretly saw, persuaded Qi envoy.

sentences.zh: 齊使以為奇，竊載與之齊。

translations.text: Qi envoy considered it wondrous, secretly carried with him to Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊將田忌善而客待之。

translations.text: Qi general Tian Ji favored and guest treated him.

sentences.zh: 忌數與齊諸公子馳逐重射。

translations.text: Ji often with Qi various princes raced chased heavy bets.

sentences.zh: 孫子見其馬足不甚相遠，馬有上、中、下、輩。

translations.text: Sun Tzu saw their horse feet not very far apart, horses had upper, middle, lower grades.

sentences.zh: 於是孫子謂田忌曰：「君弟重射，臣能令君勝。」

translations.text: Thus Sun Tzu told Tian Ji: 'Lord gambles heavily, subject can make lord win.'

sentences.zh: 田忌信然之，與王及諸公子逐射千金。

translations.text: Tian Ji believed it so, with king and various princes gambled thousand gold.

sentences.zh: 及臨質，孫子曰：「今以君之下駟與彼上駟，取君上駟與彼中駟，取君中駟與彼下駟。」

translations.text: When reaching the bet, Sun Tzu said: 'Now use lord's lower team against their upper team, take lord's upper team against their middle team, take lord's middle team against their lower team.'

sentences.zh: 既馳三輩畢，而田忌一不勝而再勝，卒得王千金。

translations.text: Having raced three grades finished, Tian Ji one not win two wins, ultimately obtained king thousand gold.

sentences.zh: 於是忌進孫子於威王。

translations.text: Thus Ji advanced Sun Bin to Wei Wang.

sentences.zh: 威王問兵法，遂以為師。

translations.text: Wei Wang asked military methods, thus took him as teacher.

sentences.zh: 其後魏伐趙，趙急，請救於齊。

translations.text: Afterwards Wei attacked Zhao, Zhao urgent, requested aid from Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊威王欲將孫臏，臏辭謝曰：「刑餘之人不可。」

translations.text: Qi Wei Wang wished to make Sun Bin general, Bin declined apologized: 'Punished remnant person unacceptable.'

sentences.zh: 於是乃以田忌為將，而孫子為師，居輜車中，坐為計謀。

translations.text: Thus made Tian Ji general, Sun Tzu as teacher, resided in baggage cart, sat making plans.

sentences.zh: 田忌欲引兵之趙，孫子曰：「夫解雜亂紛糾者不控棬，救鬬者不搏撠，批亢擣虛，形格勢禁，則自為解耳。

translations.text: Tian Ji wished to lead troops to Zhao, Sun Tzu said: 'Those who resolve tangled disorder disputes do not grasp cudgel, those who save fighters do not strike fists, strike the solid attack the empty, form blocks momentum restrains, then self resolves.

sentences.zh: 今梁趙相攻，輕兵銳卒必竭於外，老弱罷於內。

translations.text: Now Liang Zhao attack each other, light troops sharp soldiers must exhaust externally, old weak tired internally.

sentences.zh: 君不若引兵疾走大梁，據其街路，衝其方虛，彼必釋趙而自救。

translations.text: Lord not as good as lead troops hasten to Daliang, occupy its thoroughfares, attack its just empty, they must release Zhao and self rescue.

sentences.zh: 是我一舉解趙之圍而收獘於魏也。」

translations.text: This is our one action resolves Zhao's siege and gains crippled from Wei.'

sentences.zh: 田忌從之，魏果去邯鄲，與齊戰於桂陵，大破梁軍。

translations.text: Tian Ji followed it, Wei indeed left Handan, fought Qi at Guiling, greatly broke Liang army.

Afterwards Wei attacked Zhao, Zhao urgent, requested aid from Qi. Qi Wei Wang wished to make Sun Bin general, Bin declined apologized: 'Punished remnant person unacceptable.' Thus made Tian Ji general, Sun Tzu as teacher, resided in baggage cart, sat making plans. sentences.zh: 後十三歲，魏與趙攻韓，韓告急於齊。

translations.text: Thirteen years later, Wei with Zhao attacked Han, Han urgently informed Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊使田忌將而往，直走大梁。

translations.text: Qi sent Tian Ji as general to go, directly hasten to Daliang.

sentences.zh: 魏將龐涓聞之，去韓而歸，齊軍既已過而西矣。

translations.text: Wei general Pang Juan heard it, left Han and returned, Qi army having already passed and went west.

sentences.zh: 孫子謂田忌曰：「彼三晉之兵素悍勇而輕齊，齊號為怯，善戰者因其勢而利導之。

translations.text: Sun Tzu told Tian Ji: 'Those three Jin states' troops originally fierce brave and belittle Qi, Qi called cowardly, good warriors follow their momentum and beneficially guide it.

sentences.zh: 兵法，百里而趣利者蹶上將，五十里而趣利者軍半至。

translations.text: Military methods, those who hasten for profit hundred li stumble chief general, fifty li hasten for profit army half arrives.

sentences.zh: 使齊軍入魏地為十萬灶，明日為五萬灶，又明日為三萬灶。」

translations.text: Make Qi army enter Wei territory make ten myriad stoves, next day five myriad stoves, again next day three myriad stoves.'

sentences.zh: 龐涓行三日，大喜，曰：「我固知齊軍怯，入吾地三日，士卒亡者過半矣。」

translations.text: Pang Juan marched three days, greatly delighted, said: 'I originally knew Qi army cowardly, entered my territory three days, soldiers fled over half.'

sentences.zh: 乃棄其步軍，與其輕銳倍日并行逐之。

translations.text: Thus abandoned his infantry, with his light sharp doubled days parallel marched pursued them.

sentences.zh: 孫子度其行，暮當至馬陵。

translations.text: Sun Tzu calculated his march, evening should reach Maling.

sentences.zh: 馬陵道陜，而旁多阻隘，可伏兵，乃斫大樹白而書之曰「龐涓死于此樹之下」。

translations.text: Maling path narrow, and sides many narrow defiles, can ambush troops, thus chopped big tree white and wrote on it 'Pang Juan dies under this tree.'

sentences.zh: 於是令齊軍善射者萬弩，夾道而伏，期曰「暮見火舉而俱發」。

translations.text: Thus commanded Qi army good archers ten thousand crossbows, flank road and lie in wait, appointed saying 'Evening see fire raise and all fire.'

sentences.zh: 龐涓果夜至斫木下，見白書，乃鉆火燭之。

translations.text: Pang Juan indeed night arrived chopped tree below, saw white writing, thus drilled fire illuminated it.

sentences.zh: 讀其書未畢，齊軍萬弩俱發，魏軍大亂相失。

translations.text: Read its writing not finished, Qi army ten thousand crossbows all fired, Wei army greatly disordered mutually lost.

sentences.zh: 龐涓自知智窮兵敗，乃自剄，曰：「遂成豎子之名！」

translations.text: Pang Juan self knew wisdom exhausted troops defeated, thus self stabbed, said: 'Accomplished boy's name!'

sentences.zh: 齊因乘勝盡破其軍，虜魏太子申以歸。

translations.text: Qi thus rode victory completely broke their army, captured Wei crown prince Shen to return.

sentences.zh: 孫臏以此名顯天下，世傳其兵法。

translations.text: Sun Bin with this name illustrious world, world transmits his military methods.

sentences.zh: 吳起者，衛人也，好用兵。

translations.text: Wu Qi was a Wei man, good at using troops.

sentences.zh: 嘗學於曾子，事魯君。

translations.text: Once studied under Zeng Zi, served Lu lord.

sentences.zh: 齊人攻魯，魯欲將吳起，吳起取齊女為妻，而魯疑之。

translations.text: Qi people attacked Lu, Lu wished to make Wu Qi general, Wu Qi took Qi woman as wife, yet Lu doubted him.

sentences.zh: 吳起於是欲就名，遂殺其妻，以明不與齊也。

translations.text: Wu Qi thus wished to establish reputation, thus killed his wife, to clarify not with Qi.

sentences.zh: 魯卒以為將。

translations.text: Lu ultimately made him general.

sentences.zh: 將而攻齊，大破之。

translations.text: As general attacked Qi, greatly broke them.

Wu Qi was a Wei man, good at using troops. Once studied under Zeng Zi, served Lu lord. Qi people attacked Lu, Lu wished to make Wu Qi general, Wu Qi took Qi woman as wife, yet Lu doubted him. Wu Qi thus wished to establish reputation, thus killed his wife, to clarify not with Qi. Lu ultimately made him general. As general attacked Qi, greatly broke them.

sentences.zh: 魯人或惡吳起曰：「起之為人，猜忍人也。

translations.text: Lu people some hated Wu Qi saying: 'Qi as person, suspicious cruel person.

sentences.zh: 其少時，家累千金，游仕不遂，遂破其家，鄉黨笑之，吳起殺其謗己者三十餘人，而東出衛郭門。

translations.text: His youth, family accumulated thousand gold, sought office not successful, thus broke his family, village and ward laughed at him, Wu Qi killed those who slandered him over thirty people, and east went out Wei outer gate.

sentences.zh: 與其母訣，齧臂而盟曰：『起不為卿相，不復入衛。』

translations.text: With his mother parted, bit arm and swore: 'Qi not become chancellor prime minister, not again enter Wei.'

sentences.zh: 遂事曾子。

translations.text: Thus served Zeng Zi.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，其母死，起終不歸。

translations.text: Stayed period, his mother died, Qi ultimately not return.

sentences.zh: 曾子薄之，而與起絕。

translations.text: Zeng Zi despised him, and broke with Qi.

sentences.zh: 起乃之魯，學兵法以事魯君。

translations.text: Qi then went to Lu, studied military methods to serve Lu lord.

sentences.zh: 魯君疑之，起殺妻以求將。

translations.text: Lu lord doubted him, Qi killed wife to seek generalship.

sentences.zh: 夫魯小國，而有戰勝之名，則諸侯圖魯矣。

translations.text: Now Lu small state, yet has victorious name, then feudal lords plot against Lu.

sentences.zh: 且魯衛兄弟之國也，而君用起，則是棄衛。」

translations.text: Moreover Lu Wei brother states, yet lord uses Qi, then abandons Wei.'

sentences.zh: 魯君疑之，謝吳起。

translations.text: Lu lord doubted him, declined Wu Qi.

Now Lu small state, yet has victorious name, then feudal lords plot against Lu. Moreover Lu Wei brother states, yet lord uses Qi, then abandons Wei.' Lu lord doubted him, declined Wu Qi.

sentences.zh: 吳起於是聞魏文侯賢，欲事之。

translations.text: Wu Qi thus heard Wei Wen Hou worthy, wished to serve him.

sentences.zh: 文侯問李克曰：「吳起何如人哉？」

translations.text: Wen Hou asked Li Ke: 'Wu Qi what kind of person?'

sentences.zh: 李克曰：「起貪而好色，然用兵司馬穰苴不能過也。」

translations.text: Li Ke said: 'Qi greedy and fond of sex, yet using troops Sima Rangju cannot surpass.'

sentences.zh: 於是魏文候以為將，擊秦，拔五城。

translations.text: Thus Wei Wen Hou made him general, attacked Qin, captured five cities.

Wu Qi thus heard Wei Wen Hou worthy, wished to serve him. Wen Hou asked Li Ke: 'Wu Qi what kind of person?' Li Ke said: 'Qi greedy and fond of sex, yet using troops Sima Rangju cannot surpass.' Thus Wei Wen Hou made him general, attacked Qin, captured five cities.

sentences.zh: 起之為將，與士卒最下者同衣食。

translations.text: Qi's as general, with soldiers lowest ones shared clothing food.

sentences.zh: 臥不設席，行不騎乘，親裹贏糧，與士卒分勞苦。

translations.text: Slept not set mat, marched not rode carriage, personally wrapped dried rations, with soldiers shared toil bitterness.

sentences.zh: 卒有病疽者，起為吮之。

translations.text: Soldier had sick carbuncle, Qi sucked it for him.

sentences.zh: 卒母聞而哭之。

translations.text: Soldier's mother heard and wept for him.

sentences.zh: 人曰：「子卒也，而將軍自吮其疽，何哭為？」

translations.text: Person said: 'Your son soldier, yet general personally sucks his carbuncle, why weep?'

sentences.zh: 母曰：「非然也。

translations.text: Mother said: 'Not so.

sentences.zh: 往年吳公吮其父，其父戰不旋踵，遂死於敵。

translations.text: Past year Wu Gong sucked his father, his father fought not turned heels, thus died among enemies.

sentences.zh: 吳公今又吮其子，妾不知其死所矣。

translations.text: Wu Gong now again sucks his son, I do not know his death place.

sentences.zh: 是以哭之。」

translations.text: Therefore weep for him.'

Qi's as general, with soldiers lowest ones shared clothing food. Slept not set mat, marched not rode carriage, personally wrapped dried rations, with soldiers shared toil bitterness. Soldier had sick carbuncle, Qi sucked it for him. Soldier's mother heard and wept for him. Person said: 'Your son soldier, yet general personally sucks his carbuncle, why weep?' Mother said: 'Not so. Past year Wu Gong sucked his father, his father fought not turned heels, thus died among enemies. Wu Gong now again sucks his son, I do not know his death place. Therefore weep for him.'

sentences.zh: 文侯以吳起善用兵，廉平，盡能得士心，乃以為西河守，以拒秦、韓。

translations.text: Wen Hou because Wu Qi good at using troops, frugal upright, completely could obtain soldiers' hearts, thus made him Xihé governor, to resist Qin, Han.

sentences.zh: 魏文侯既卒，起事其子武侯。

translations.text: Wei Wen Hou having died, Qi served his son Wu Hou.

sentences.zh: 武侯浮西河而下，中流，顧而謂吳起曰：「美哉乎山河之固，此魏國之寶也！」

translations.text: Wu Hou floated Xihé and descended, middle stream, turned and told Wu Qi: 'Beautiful indeed mountains rivers' solidity, this Wei state's treasure!'

sentences.zh: 起對曰：「在德不在險。

translations.text: Qi answered: 'In virtue not in danger.

sentences.zh: 昔三苗氏左洞庭，右彭蠡，德義不修，禹滅之。

translations.text: Formerly San Miao clan left Dongting, right Pengli, virtue righteousness not cultivated, Yu extinguished them.

sentences.zh: 夏桀之居，左河濟，右泰華，伊闕在其南，羊腸在其北，修政不仁，湯放之。

translations.text: Xia Jie residence, left He Ji, right Tai Hua, Yi Que in its south, Yang Chang in its north, cultivated governance not benevolent, Tang exiled him.

sentences.zh: 殷紂之國，左孟門，右太行，常山在其北，大河經其南，修政不德，武王殺之。

translations.text: Yin Zhou state, left Meng Men, right Tai Hang, Chang Shan in its north, great river through its south, cultivated governance not virtuous, Wu Wang killed him.

sentences.zh: 由此觀之，在德不在險。

translations.text: From this observe, in virtue not in danger.

sentences.zh: 若君不修德，舟中之人盡為敵國也。」

translations.text: If lord not cultivate virtue, boat middle people all become enemy states.'

sentences.zh: 武侯曰：「善。」

translations.text: Wu Hou said: 'Good.'

Wei Wen Hou having died, Qi served his son Wu Hou. Wu Hou floated Xihé and descended, middle stream, turned and told Wu Qi: 'Beautiful indeed mountains rivers' solidity, this Wei state's treasure!' Qi answered: 'In virtue not in danger. Formerly San Miao clan left Dongting, right Pengli, virtue righteousness not cultivated, Yu extinguished them. Xia Jie residence, left He Ji, right Tai Hua, Yi Que in its south, Yang Chang in its north, cultivated governance not benevolent, Tang exiled him. Yin Zhou state, left Meng Men, right Tai Hang, Chang Shan in its north, great river through its south, cultivated governance not virtuous, Wu Wang killed him. From this observe, in virtue not in danger. If lord not cultivate virtue, boat middle people all become enemy states.' Wu Hou said: 'Good.'

sentences.zh: （即封）吳起為西河守，甚有聲名。

translations.text: Enfeoffed Wu Qi as Xihé governor, very had reputation.

sentences.zh: 魏置相，相田文。

translations.text: Wei established chancellor, chancellor Tian Wen.

sentences.zh: 吳起不悅，謂田文曰：「請與子論功，可乎？」

translations.text: Wu Qi not pleased, told Tian Wen: 'Please with you discuss merit, acceptable?'

sentences.zh: 田文曰：「可。」

translations.text: Tian Wen said: 'Acceptable.'

sentences.zh: 起曰：「將三軍，使士卒樂死，敵國不敢謀，子孰與起？」

translations.text: Qi said: 'Lead three armies, make soldiers happily die, enemy states dare not plot, you which with Qi?'

sentences.zh: 文曰：「不如子。」

translations.text: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'

sentences.zh: 起曰：「治百官，親萬民，實府庫，子孰與起？」

translations.text: Qi said: 'Govern hundred officials, close ten thousand people, fill treasuries storehouses, you which with Qi?'

sentences.zh: 文曰：「不如子。」

translations.text: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'

sentences.zh: 起曰：「守西河而秦兵不敢東鄉，韓趙賓從，子孰與起？」

translations.text: Qi said: 'Guard Xihé and Qin troops dare not east face, Han Zhao submit follow, you which with Qi?'

sentences.zh: 文曰：「不如子。」

translations.text: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'

sentences.zh: 起曰：「此三者，子皆出吾下，而位加吾上，何也？」

translations.text: Qi said: 'These three, you all below me, yet position above me, why?'

sentences.zh: 文曰：「主少國疑，大臣未附，百姓不信，方是之時，屬之於子乎？

translations.text: Wen said: 'Lord young state doubtful, ministers not attached, people not trusting, at this time, entrust to you or entrust to me?'

sentences.zh: 屬之於我乎？」

translations.text: Qi silent good long while, said: 'Entrust to you.'

sentences.zh: 起默然良久，曰：「屬之子矣。」

translations.text: Wen said: 'This is why I reside above you.'

sentences.zh: 文曰：「此乃吾所以居子之上也。」

translations.text: Wu Qi then self knew not as good as Tian Wen.

sentences.zh: 吳起乃自知弗如田文。

translations.text: Tian Wen having died, Gong Shu became chancellor, married Wei princess, yet harmed Wu Qi.

Enfeoffed Wu Qi as Xihé governor, very had reputation. Wei established chancellor, chancellor Tian Wen. Wu Qi not pleased, told Tian Wen: 'Please with you discuss merit, acceptable?' Tian Wen said: 'Acceptable.' Qi said: 'Lead three armies, make soldiers happily die, enemy states dare not plot, you which with Qi?' Wen said: 'Not as good as you.' Qi said: 'Govern hundred officials, close ten thousand people, fill treasuries storehouses, you which with Qi?' Wen said: 'Not as good as you.' Qi said: 'Guard Xihé and Qin troops dare not east face, Han Zhao submit follow, you which with Qi?' Wen said: 'Not as good as you.' Qi said: 'These three, you all below me, yet position above me, why?' Wen said: 'Lord young state doubtful, ministers not attached, people not trusting, at this time, entrust to you or entrust to me?' Qi silent good long while, said: 'Entrust to you.' Wen said: 'This is why I reside above you.' Wu Qi then self knew not as good as Tian Wen. Tian Wen having died, Gong Shu became chancellor, married Wei princess, yet harmed Wu Qi.

sentences.zh: 田文既死，公叔為相，尚魏公主，而害吳起。

translations.text: Gong Shu's servant said: 'Qi easy to remove.'

sentences.zh: 公叔之仆曰：「起易去也。」

translations.text: Gong Shu said: 'How?'

sentences.zh: 公叔曰：「柰何？」

translations.text: His servant said: 'Wu Qi as person principled frugal yet self loves reputation.

sentences.zh: 其仆曰：「吳起為人節廉而自喜名也。

translations.text: Lord thus first with Wu Hou speak: 'Wu Qi worthy person, yet Hou's state small, moreover with strong Qin borders, subject secretly fear Qi has no staying heart.'

sentences.zh: 君因先與武侯言曰：『夫吳起賢人也，而侯之國小，又與彊秦壤界，臣竊恐起之無留心也。』

translations.text: Wu Hou immediately said: 'How?'

sentences.zh: 武侯即曰：『柰何？』

translations.text: Lord thus told Wu Hou: 'Try betroth with princess, Qi has staying heart then certainly accepts.

sentences.zh: 君因謂武侯曰：『試延以公主，起有留心則必受之。

translations.text: No staying heart then certainly declines.

sentences.zh: 無留心則必辭矣。

translations.text: With this divine it.'

sentences.zh: 以此卜之。』

translations.text: Lord thus summoned Wu Qi and betrothed with him, immediately made princess angry and belittle lord.

sentences.zh: 君因召吳起而與歸，即令公主怒而輕君。

translations.text: Wu Qi seeing princess belittles lord, then certainly declines.'

sentences.zh: 吳起見公主之賤君也，則必辭。」

translations.text: Thus Wu Qi seeing princess belittles Wei chancellor, indeed declined Wei Wu Hou.

sentences.zh: 於是吳起見公主之賤魏相，果辭魏武侯。

translations.text: Wu Hou doubted it yet not believed.

sentences.zh: 武侯疑之而弗信也。

translations.text: Wu Qi feared obtaining crime, thus departed, went to Chu.

sentences.zh: 吳起懼得罪，遂去，即之楚。

translations.text: Chu Dao Wang originally heard Qi worthy, arrived then made chancellor of Chu.

Gong Shu's servant said: 'Qi easy to remove.' Gong Shu said: 'How?' His servant said: 'Wu Qi as person principled frugal yet self loves reputation. Lord thus first with Wu Hou speak: 'Wu Qi worthy person, yet Hou's state small, moreover with strong Qin borders, subject secretly fear Qi has no staying heart.' Wu Hou immediately said: 'How?' Lord thus told Wu Hou: 'Try betroth with princess, Qi has staying heart then certainly accepts. No staying heart then certainly declines. With this divine it.' Lord thus summoned Wu Qi and betrothed with him, immediately made princess angry and belittle lord. Wu Qi seeing princess belittles lord, then certainly declines.' Thus Wu Qi seeing princess belittles Wei chancellor, indeed declined Wei Wu Hou. Wu Hou doubted it yet not believed. Wu Qi feared obtaining crime, thus departed, went to Chu. Chu Dao Wang originally heard Qi worthy, arrived then made chancellor of Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚悼王素聞起賢，至則相楚。

translations.text: Clarified laws examined commands, discarded not urgent officials, abolished ducal clan distant ones, to nurture fighting soldiers.

sentences.zh: 明法審令，捐不急之官，廢公族疏遠者，以撫養戰鬬之士。

translations.text: Essentials in strengthening troops, broke galloping persuaders' words of alliances.

sentences.zh: 要在彊兵，破馳說之言從橫者。

translations.text: Thus south pacified hundred Yue;

sentences.zh: 於是南平百越；

translations.text: north annexed Chen Cai, repelled three Jin;

sentences.zh: 北并陳蔡，卻三晉；

translations.text: west attacked Qin.

sentences.zh: 西伐秦。
諸侯患楚之彊。
故楚之貴戚盡欲害吳起。
及悼王死，宗室大臣作亂而攻吳起，吳起走之王尸而伏之。
擊起之徒因射刺吳起，并中悼王。
悼王既葬，太子立，乃使令尹盡誅射吳起而并中王尸者。
坐射起而夷宗死者七十餘家。

translations.text: Clarified laws examined commands, discarded not urgent officials, abolished ducal clan distant ones, to nurture fighting soldiers. Essentials in strengthening troops, broke galloping persuaders' words of alliances. Thus south pacified hundred Yue; north annexed Chen Cai, repelled three Jin; west attacked Qin.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：世俗所稱師旅，皆道孫子十三篇，吳起兵法，世多有，故弗論，論其行事所施設者。
語曰：「能行之者未必能言，能言之者未必能行。」
孫子籌策龐涓明矣，然不能蚤救患於被刑。
吳起說武侯以形勢不如德，然行之於楚，以刻暴少恩亡其軀。
悲夫！
